## Code Review

This pull request introduces automatic OGP (Open Graph Protocol) image generation for blog posts, utilizing Satori for JSX-to-SVG conversion and sharp for SVG-to-PNG conversion. Key changes include adding the `satori` package and its related dependencies, creating new files for the OGP image generation endpoint (`src/pages/og/[...slug].png.ts`) and the OGP card design component (`src/lib/og-image.tsx`), and updating Astro layout components (`src/components/BaseHead.astro`, `src/layouts/BaseLayout.astro`, `src/layouts/BlogPost.astro`) to support the new OGP image paths. Additionally, new project configuration files for Serena (`.serena/project.yml`, `.serena/.gitignore`) and Playwright (`.mcp.json`) were added, along with a Git branching strategy document (`.claude/rules/git_branching_strategy.md`) and a PR review skill definition (`.claude/skills/SKILL.md`).

Review comments highlight several areas for improvement: The fallback OGP image URL generation in `src/components/BaseHead.astro` should use `Astro.site` instead of `Astro.url` to ensure correct root-relative path resolution. The `getOgImage` function in `src/lib/og-image.tsx` is advised to be refactored to use actual JSX syntax for improved readability and maintainability, as Satori supports it directly. Furthermore, the `loadGoogleFont` function in `src/lib/og-image.tsx` should be called in parallel using `Promise.all` for multiple font weights to optimize build times, and its regular expression for parsing font URLs should be made more robust to handle variations in Google Fonts API responses.

## Code Review

ブログ記事のOGP画像を自動生成する機能の実装、素晴らしいです。SatoriとSharpを使った実装は適切で、コードも全体的にきれいに書かれていると感じました。コードの可読性や堅牢性をさらに高めるための軽微な提案をいくつかさせていただきました。
また、この機能の中心となる新しいエンドポイント `src/pages/og/[...slug].png.ts` がPRの説明や設計書で言及されていますが、そのコードが今回のプルリクエストの変更に含まれていないようです。お手数ですが、完全なレビューのためにこのファイルも変更に含めていただけると幸いです。
